Articles.Content:
i,m stuck with 2 kerbals on the Mun.And i want to build a rover that can drive to the other side of the Mun to go and get the other kerbal.but the problem is that i haven't unlocked the rover parts yetÃ¢â‚¬Â¦..

is there any way i can build a "rover" that works with the jet wheels?

please help me:(

You absolutely can, but it'd have to be rocket-propelled. But in that case, why not simply make a second lander to land at his location?

Welcome aboard!

I don't think you've noticed just how big Mun is. It would take a couple of days of real-time, full-time, to drive half-way around it. And that's assuming you don't crash along the way, which is a large risk, because the terrain is quite rough and the light gravity won't help you cling to it. Do yourself a favor and fly to the other Kerbal, even if it means sending a second ship for him.
